songs.title: Ashes of Bayou
songs.structure: 5 movements: Departure, Descent, Return, Reprise, Coda
songs.notes: A thunderous metal anthem reimagining 'Blue Bayou'. Southern Gothic metal ballad in three movements.

songs.title: Moonburn Requiem
songs.structure: 5 acts: The Shatter, The Silence, The Burn, The Rise, Coda
songs.notes: Bilingual doom-metal elegy. 'Lo Siento Mi Vida' reimagined as Moonburn Requiem.
songs.lyrics: See AGENT.md for full lyrics - Spanish/English bilingual

songs.title: Hexed and Gone
songs.structure: 6 movements: The Scar, The Curse, The Reckoning, The Exit, Final Chorus, Coda
songs.notes: Venom-laced breakup anthem. 'You're No Good' as metal opera.

songs.title: Wretched and Wild
songs.structure: 6 movements: The Curse, The Crush, The Chaos, The Crown, Reprise, Coda
songs.notes: Theatrical metal banger. 'Poor Poor Pitiful Me' as glam-thrash.

songs.title: Iron Rider
songs.structure: 5 acts: The Drift, The Cards, The Cold, The Gate, The Warning
songs.notes: Gothic-western metal elegy. 'Desperado' reimagined as Iron Rider.

songs.title: All I Know Is Fire
songs.structure: 4 acts: The Mirror, The Wreckage, The Revelation, The Flame
songs.notes: Symphonic power-metal ballad. 'Don't Know Much' transformed into volcanic love song.

songs.title: Doesn't Matter, Never Did
songs.structure: 3 acts: The Cry, The Curse, The Cut
songs.notes: Glitter and chains breakup anthem. Buddy Holly-inspired.

songs.title: All My Life (To Find You)
songs.structure: 3 acts: The Dream, The Prayer, The Flame
songs.notes: Triumphant power-metal love anthem. Cinematic and soaring.

songs.title: The Story of My Knife
songs.structure: 3 acts: The Street, The Flame, The Morning
songs.notes: Gothic-glam ballad about longing. 'Someone to Lay Down Beside Me' reimagined.

songs.title: Mountain of Fire
songs.structure: 5 movements: Throttle, Trestle, Union, Arrival, Forevermore
songs.notes: Full-throttle metal epic. Gospel standard meets Iron Maiden.
